desctiption: In this sprawling metropolis, Banyan Tree Bangkok stands out as a much-needed 'sanctuary for the senses' and a rejuvenating spa retreat. The Only All-suite Hotel, Banyan Tree Bangkok is situated in the heart of the Bangkok's central business and embassy district, offering easy access to the downtown shopping and entertainment area of Silom Road, and the city's sight seeing attractions. A gourmet tour of the hotel will take you to the capital's highest fine-dining establishments: Vertigo Grill (61st floor), The World Highest Open-rooftop Restaurant In A City, Bai Yun (60th floor) and Saffron (59th floor), which turn a meal into a true highlight of your journey through Asia. For relaxation, Guests can visit Asia's Tallest Garden Spa Located On 51-54 Floors.
highlights: ["Banquets & MeetingsTwelve total meeting rooms, able to accomodate up to 170 peopleExecutive RetreatSeveral smaller meeting rooms to accommodate more intimate gatheringsFine Dining on SiteBangkok's highest fine-dining choices, Vertigo Grill (61st floor), Bayun (60th floor) and Saffron (59th floor)Fine Dining NearbyLocated in central business district with other fine dining options nearbyHigh Speed InternetWireless accessPool, OutdoorRooftop poolSpa FacilityTwenty-three treatment rooms with breathtaking views over the cityShoppingShopping within ten minute walk of hotelRecommended RoomsEach of the guest rooms has a panoramic view of Bangkok, with cityscape and river views from floor to ceiling windows over the city."]

Hotel Concierge helped us to book some tours and advices around food options were brilliant.', 'overview': 'We will be back again'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'body': 'Banyan Tree has been the best hotel during our fifteen days trip in Thailand.Rooms are more than big, with two separate stances. The pool, located in floor 21, offers great views of the city.', 'overview': 'Undoubtedly best hotel in Bangkok'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'body': "Very well priced hotel and very modern high class. The restaurant on the roof is amazing and the food is 6star rated. Rooms have beautiful views of city of Bangkok. The infinity pool is breath taking on the upper floors and it's close to financial quarter and all shopping malls are very close by so late night shopping is a must.", 'overview': 'Honeymoon 2006'}, {'points': {'Service': '5 of 5 stars', 'Value': '5 of 5 stars', 'Rooms': '5 of 5 stars', 'Location': '3 of 5 stars', 'Sleep Quality': '5 of 5 stars', 'Cleanliness': '5 of 5 stars'}, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'body': "I have been in Banyan Tree Bangkok from 12 to 16 August.Last day after check out, I was too late and missed my flight due to terrible traffic.I was really upset and embarrassed. I asked your Concierge to help me. Mr. Noom and Mr. Rewaht contacted to Qatar Airways to find later flight and help me to transfer further charge of flight. It was really amazing service for us. They let me to meet Ms. Toon who waited for me at the airport.She helped me arrival at the airport, change to tickets and check-in. Without them, I couldn't come back safely with my 6 years old daughter.  I was deeply moved. I really appreciate your amazing service. I will have been in Banyan tree bangkok this December for holidays and I will choose Banyan tree when I will be away in the other countries. I will recommend my friends to Banyan tree bangkok.", 'overview': 'Amazing and friendly service!'}, {'points': None, 'rating': '5 of 5 stars', 'body': 'This is my second visit in Banyan Tree Bangkok not included with other Banyan Tree brands in Thailand and overseas. Guest services providing must be the highlight as always. Upon my arrival, the welcoming team at front desk really surprised me that even a little detail such as my running nose and a cough caught their attention and made sure my comfort during check in process and rearranged the room assignment for me. What a wonderful treat! I felt special and been taken care tenderly. I stayed in Oasis Retreat room for 2 nights, love it! The cozy feeling paused me in the room, enjoyed my bathing lazily during sunset and good Thai food from room service, so divine!', 'overview': '2 Thumbs up!!!'}]
